title: CAF Women Champions League : Individual Awardees Revealed
body_text:
Following the emergence of TP Mazembe as champions of the 2024 CAF Women’s Champions League, individual awardees have been revealed.
Recall that TP Mazembe were crowned queens of African club football on Saturday, 23 November after overcoming AS FAR 1-0 to secure a first-ever title.
AS FAR playmaker, Sanaa Mssoudy was crowned the Best Player of the Tournament while teenage sensation, Doha El Madani of AS FAR FC emerged top goalscorer with 6 goals.
FC Masar goalkeeper, Habiba Emad coast home the Best Goalkeeper of the Tournament while their team won the Fair Play Award.
In addition to the coveted CAF Women’s Champions League trophy, TP Mazembe also took home $600 000 in prize money, while runners-up AS FAR got $400 000.
